metadata.description: Each PixelSaur has the ability to have their own background story. As part of the utility for PixelSaurus Tri, each collector can choose up to 3 traits (pronouns / job / hobbies / disability etc), which the PixelSaurus team will write into the background story. Please submit your PixelSaur's traits to us via the 'Submit Traits' link on the PixelSaurus minting website at: https://mint.pixelsaurus.io/. If you do not wish to choose traits right away, you can save the feature for future use or keep as an investment with any future sale of the NFT.
metadata.name: PixelSaurus Tri #0001 [Common]
